title: 服务器崩溃
author: caoyuxin
txt_content:

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content:
按照这条消息：Chunk (-1875000, -1875000) stored at  (-1874999, -1875000) in world 'world'
把这个区块删了试试？

replies.author: AJ_
replies.txt_content: 又是区块崩溃 检查MOD兼容性

replies.author: caoyuxin
replies.txt_content:
AJ_ 发表于 2018-2-1 12:57
又是区块崩溃 检查MOD兼容性
mod都没问题，就是远距离传送就这样
